entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Smithers
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Sunny, -10.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Smithers Airport 3:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Mainly Sunny
Temperature: -10.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 29 %
Wind Chill: -16
Dewpoint: -24.7°C
Wind: NE 13 km/h gust 30 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy late this evening. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Clearing in the morning. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 30 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 in the evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023
